transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: [Unintelligible] IndiaMART le irunthu.
Customer: Sollunga madam.
Executive: Sir andha location vandhu actually backend la update pannitanga. Adhu live la actually vandhurum innaiku.
Customer: Ok madam.
Executive: Saturday sollirundhen illai sir. Ungalukku Saturday vandhu office leave so innaiku dhaan adha process pandra maari irukkum appidinnu sollittu. So innaiku vandhu naan initiate pannitten sir. Adhu innaiku kulla backend la alai vandhurum. Naan sonna maari konjam neenga leads edukkiradhu mattum first orundu naalukku mattum keyword like location paakaadhinga sir. Keyword match pandradhukku neenga leads vandhu edukka aarambichirunga. Like next week la irundhu polapola neenga vandhu location based panni ippo current ah change aaidichu sir. Backend la paathinga appidinnna neenga Erode la dhaan adhikkama edukkiringa appidindra maari city la change aaidichu. So konjam konjama neenga edukka edukka vandhu oru oru preference ah vandhu change aaga aarambikkum sir.
Customer: Ok madam.
Executive: Adhai inform pannalaamnu call panninen. Neenga paaringa sir edhaavadhu doubts irundha just enaikku konjam call back mattra pannunga sir.
Customer: Ok ok madam. Thank you.
Executive: Ok ok thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's location was not updated.

- Wants to take leads based on location.



Resolution:

- Executive informed location updated in backend.

- Advised to take leads based on keywords.

- Location preference will change gradually.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call back if any doubts.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- location, buyleads, backend update
